attributes.action: Arrest and charge the McCanns with child neglect on their return to the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We all agree that the plight of Madeleine is utmost in our minds. What needs to be second is the behaviour of her parents. These are two middle class, highly educated people whose much wanted children were the result of IVF. Why then would you leave these three children, all under age four, on their own in an unlocked apartment? In this country it is recommended by the NSPCC that you do not leave a child under 13 unsupervised for more than brief periods. Leaving them alone for an hour in an unlocked apartment must surely qualifly for an investigation by Social Services at the very least. This is a most shameful case of neglect and must be treated as such when the McCanns return home. The media campaign that the McCanns have started to find their daughter is all well and good, and may help appease their guilty conscience's, but they must be called to account for their actions. There should be one set law for the age limit to leave children alone, no grey area or rules set by Social Services.
